title: Nmoder Women's Plus Size Stretchy Flared Wrap Dress Casuel Wedding Guest Work Midi Dresses V Neck 3/4 Sleeve A-Line Dress

【WHAT YOU GET】A eye-catching fit and flare dress, free exchange and return, in-time reply in 24 hrs.Size of model fit on:XL. Warm tips:If you are hesitating between two sizes,it is recommended to choose the larger one.Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
